attributes.action: Apologise to the nation for his gross error in mistaking the credit bubble for an economic miracle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown became Chancellor in 1997 during the greatest credit bubble in history. He went on to mistake this for an economic miracle that he had wrought and hubristically called an "end to boom and bust". We the undersigned call upon Gordon Brown to issue a full and frank apology to the nation for his error.
